/usr/bin/g++  CMakeFiles/NBody_CUDA.dir/main.cu.o CMakeFiles/NBody_CUDA.dir/simulation.cu.o CMakeFiles/NBody_CUDA.dir/cmake_device_link.o -o NBody_CUDA  -lsfml-graphics -lsfml-window -lsfml-system -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static  -L"/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs" -L"/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib" -lrt -lpthread -ldl
